p.k: When the horn sounded on their 116-108 win over the Celtics to clinch the Magic's first postseason berth since 2012, they took some extra time to celebrate. Terrence Ross had 26 points, Nikola Vucevic finished with 25 points and 12 rebounds and Evan Fournier added 24 points for Orlando. The victory also gave the Magic their first regular-season sweep over Boston since 1996-97.
